Mario Clone

Developed in a group of 5. Language used: Java with swing.

A 2D platformer game, with goal to get to the flag by the end of the map. Including performance monitor, show collision-box on/off and highscore to a server. The map can be modified by editing a textfile. Part goal of the project was to learn working as a group and using Git.
